root.PROPERTY:name: Name
root.FORM:ERROR:passwordMismatch: The specified password do not match.
root.FORM:ERROR:LOGIN_USED: The specified login is already used in another active account.
root.FORM:HELP:password: Enter a new password only if you want to change the current password.
root.LOG_IN_FORM:RESET:SUBJECT: [{APP_NAME}] Password reset
root.LOG_IN_FORM:RESET:TEXT:
We've received a request to reset your password for the {APP_NAME} app.

To change your password, please click this link:
{resetUrl}

Password reset links are valid for only 24 hours. If the link expires, you will need to submit a new request here: {appUrl}

If you didn't request a change, please disregard this e-mail and your password will stay the same.

Contact your supervisor or an administrator if you need help or have questions.

Sincerely, the support team.
root.LOG_IN_FORM:MSG:INVALID_EMAIL: User doesn't have an e-mail address.
root.LOG_IN_FORM:MSG:MANY_MATCHES: Found many users matching the specified login!
root.LOG_IN_FORM:UNSAFE_PASSWORD:
You can't log in, because your password is the same as your login or personnel ID.

Use the form below to set a new password for your account. Before using the new password it must be activated by clicking a link sent to the e-mail address associated with your account/

In case of any problems, contact your supervisor.
root.anonymize:title: User anonymization
root.anonymize:message:
Are you sure you want to anonymize the chosen user?

User's account will be deactivated and identification data removed from the database.

This operation is irreversible!
